Author: trademindxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] - Trademindx - Artificial Intelligence for Cryptocurrency Trading
Body: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/xjp42tv2iww1m17/logo.png  Hi all,  We'd like to introduce Trademindx to the Bitcoin Talk Forum community. It is an AI system for cryptocurrency trading.  What does it do? Simply put, Trademindx crunches huge amounts of data and tells you which cryptocurrencies to invest in for maximum returns. It is an Artificial Intelligence specifically built to analyse the cryptocurrency market.  I still don't get it! In more technical terms, Trademindx is a system that aims to facilitate daily trading decisions through applied natural-language processing, sentiment analysis and machine learning algorithms.  Built as a micro-services based distributed architecture, its primary function is to analyse large volumes of data and provide clear indicators to the trader in real-time - BUY, SELL or HOLD.  The default approach is implemented using a maximum entropy algorithm with feedback and is currently being developed specifically for cryptocurrency applications.  For a further discussion on using AI to predict cryptocurrency market moves you can check out this article - which explains our approach in more detail:  https://medium.com/@trademindxofficial/can-artificial-intelligence-predict-the-cryptocurrency-market-3fc5c3d05938  Token  A utility token based on the Ethereum blockchain and is compatible with Ethereum wallets that support ERC20 standard.  The token sale will enable us to build out the Trademindx development team, infrastructure and platform! Our token sale is not trying to raise crazy amounts of ETH, we simply want to bootstrap this exciting project and build a community around it. We have a small dedicated team and are already focussing on building out the platform.  The token can be used to gain access to the future Trademindx platform.  Early Working Prototype  We are in the initial stages of this project, but have already built an early working prototype.  Further Info  Happy to provide more details or answer any questions!  Finally, thanks for checking out this thread! You can find out more details on our homepage and register for updates here: https://trademindx.com  Best regards, Trademindx Team  Links: Homepage: https://trademindx.com Whitepaper: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/mi5aj49b3thqd5z/trademindx_whitepaper.pdf Twitter: https://twitter.com/trademindx Medium: https://medium.com/@trademindxofficial YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCynC7OrINx0lawX8HPfbnGQ GitHub: https://github.com/trademindx?tab=repositories
